content:
# Our Services

* We offer training for organizations on the following topics:Â 
* Participating in the legislative and regulatory process
* Reviewing bills and draft regulations
* Writing model policy
* Drafting effective testimony or public comment
* Communication with policymakers and media
message: For more information about training, send us a message on our [Contact page](/contact).
header: Our services to individuals and organizations include:

services.text: Assistance with drafting effective testimony or public comment
Consultation on working with policymakers and media
Training and education on marijuana regulations and related topics
